tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    data_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(15),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  payload TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cyber_threats (
  threat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  threat_description TEXT,
  threat_severity INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  destination_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  protocol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE threat_detection (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  severity INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE response_actions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    protocol VARCHAR(50),
    port INT,
    data_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE threat_detection (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(100),
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    target_ip VARCHAR(255),
    severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_response (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID,
    response_type VARCHAR(50),
    response_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    response_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_ip VARCHAR(15),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    last_seen_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    traffic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(20),
    traffic_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE threat_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    threat_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    activity_type VARCHAR(20),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE threat_alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id UUID,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_description TEXT
)
